title: Update regarding HeavyTrucks
story_body:
HeavyTrucks Inc. (TRUCK) has announced the appointment of Emily Chen as its new Director of Sustainability, effective 08:00 EST, March 12, 2023. In this role, Ms. Chen will oversee the company's environmental, social, and governance (ESG) initiatives.

Separately, HeavyTrucks Inc. has launched a targeted marketing campaign aimed at promoting its latest line of energy-efficient trucks to fleet operators in the Midwest region. The campaign, which began on March 10, 2023, will run for a period of six weeks and will feature print and online advertisements.

Additionally, HeavyTrucks Inc. has reported that it has achieved a 2% reduction in greenhouse gas emissions from its manufacturing operations in the fourth quarter of 2022 compared to the same period in the previous year. This reduction is in line with the company's previously stated ESG goals.

HeavyTrucks Inc. has also announced that its annual shareholders' meeting will be held on May 15, 2023, at 10:00 EST. The meeting will be held at the company's headquarters and will be webcast live on the company's website.
